meanings.sent1: The anticensorship group fought for freedom of speech.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated his anticensorship stance on artistic expression.
meanings.sent3: The anticensorship rally was filled with colorful signs and passionate speeches.
meanings.sent4: Her artwork was a beacon of anticensorship in a world of restrictions.
meanings.sent5: The anticensorship movement grew stronger with each new supporter.

meanings.definition: The act of preventing or countering censorship.
meanings.sent1: The anticensorship of books in the library was a controversial topic.
meanings.sent2: He dedicated his life to promoting anticensorship in the media.
meanings.sent3: The town celebrated anticensorship day with a parade and book fair.
meanings.sent4: Her research focused on the history of anticensorship efforts.
meanings.sent5: The museum showcased the importance of anticensorship throughout history.
